snippets.label: YepCode Postgres: New integration from credential
snippets.code: const postgresPool = yepcode.integration.postgres('credential-slug')

snippets.label: YepCode Postgres: New integration from plain authentication data
snippets.code:
const { Pool } = require('pg')

const postgresPool = new Pool({
    user: 'postgres',
    password: '1234abcd',
    host: 'localhost',
    database: 'testdb',
    port: 5432,
    ssl: true,
    query_timeout: 5000,
    connectionTimeoutMillis: 2000,
    max: 20,
    idleTimeoutMillis: 30000,
    idle_in_transaction_session_timeout: 10000,
    statement_timeout: 5000,
});

snippets.label: YepCode Postgres: New integration from plain authentication data (connectionString)
YepCode Postgres: Connect (async/await)
YepCode Postgres: Connect (callback)
YepCode Postgres: Disconnect (async/await)
YepCode Postgres: Disconnect (Promise)
YepCode Postgres: Disconnect (callback)
YepCode Postgres: SELECT Text only (async/await)
YepCode Postgres: SELECT Text only (Promise)
YepCode Postgres: SELECT Text only (callback)
YepCode Postgres: SELECT Parameterized (async/await)
YepCode Postgres: SELECT Parameterized (Promise)
snippets.code:
postgresPool.query(`
    SELECT id, name, price
    FROM products
    WHERE price > \$1 AND stock > \$2`,
    [100, 200]
).then((result) => {
    console.log(result.fields[0].name) // id
    console.log(result.fields[1].name) // name
    console.log(result.fields[2].name) // price
    console.log(result.rows) // [{ id, name, price }, ...]
}).catch(console.error)

snippets.label: YepCode Postgres: SELECT Parameterized (callback)
YepCode Postgres: SELECT Query object (async/await)
YepCode Postgres: SELECT Query object (Promise)
snippets.code:
const query = {
    text: `
        SELECT id, name, price
        FROM products
        WHERE price > \$1 AND stock > \$2`,
    values: ['100', '200'],
}
postgresPool.query(query)
.then((result) => {
    console.log(result.fields[0].name) // id
    console.log(result.fields[1].name) // name
    console.log(result.fields[2].name) // price
    console.log(result.rows) // [{ id, name, price }, ...]
}).catch(console.error)

snippets.label: YepCode Postgres: SELECT Query object (callback)
YepCode Postgres: INSERT Text only (async/await)
YepCode Postgres: INSERT Text only (Promise)
snippets.code:
postgresPool.query(
    "INSERT INTO products(id, name, price, stock) VALUES('12345', 'FOO', 12, 50)"
).then(result => console.log(result.rowCount)) // 1
.catch(console.error)

snippets.label: YepCode Postgres: INSERT Text only (callback)
YepCode Postgres: INSERT Parameterized (async/await)
YepCode Postgres: INSERT Parameterized (Promise)
snippets.code:
postgresPool.query(
    'INSERT INTO products(id, name, price, stock) VALUES(\$1, \$2, \$3, \$4)',
    ['12345', 'FOO', 12, 50]
).then(result => console.log(result.rowCount)) // 1
.catch(console.error)

snippets.label: YepCode Postgres: INSERT Parameterized (callback)
YepCode Postgres: INSERT Query object (async/await)
YepCode Postgres: INSERT Query object (Promise)
snippets.code:
const query = {
    text: 'INSERT INTO products(id, name, price, stock) VALUES(\$1, \$2, \$3, \$4)',
    values: ['12345', 'FOO', 12, 50]
}
postgresPool.query(query)
.then(result => console.log(result.rowCount)) // 1
.catch(console.error)

YepCode Supabase: New integration from credential
snippets.code: const supabase = yepcode.integration.supabase('credential-slug')

snippets.label: YepCode Supabase: New integration from plain authentication data
snippets.code:
const { createClient } = require('@supabase/supabase-js')

const supabase = createClient('your-project-url', 'your-api-token')

snippets.label: YepCode Supabase: Fetch data
snippets.code:
const { data, error } = await supabase
  .from('countries')
  .select('name, country_id')
  .eq('name', 'The Shire')

snippets.label: YepCode Supabase: Insert data
snippets.code:
const { error } = await supabase
  .from('countries')
  .insert({ id: 1, name: 'Denmark' })

snippets.label: YepCode Supabase: Update data
snippets.code:
const { error } = await supabase
  .from('countries')
  .update({ name: 'Australia' })
  .eq('id', 1)

snippets.label: YepCode Supabase: Upsert data
snippets.code:
const { error } = await supabase
  .from('countries')
  .upsert({ id: 1, name: 'Albania' })
  .eq('id', 1)

snippets.label: YepCode Supabase: Delete data
snippets.code:
const { error } = await supabase
  .from('countries')
  .delete()
  .eq('id', 1)

snippets.label: YepCode Supabase: Call a Postgres function
snippets.code: const { data, error } = await supabase.rpc('hello_world')

snippets.label: YepCode Supabase: List all files in a bucket
snippets.code:
const { data, error } = await supabase
  .storage
  .from('my-files')
  .list('public', {
    limit: 100,
    offset: 0,
    sortBy: { column: 'name', order: 'asc' },
  })

snippets.label: YepCode Supabase: Upload a file
snippets.code:
const textFileContent = 'the-content'

const { data, error } = await supabase
  .storage
  .from('my-files')
  .upload('public/textFile.txt', textFileContent, {
    cacheControl: '3600',
    upsert: false
  })

snippets.label: YepCode Supabase: Download a file
